svg.text: Updated February 2026 — Based on Nov 2023 v3 diagram, reviewed against codebase
No user details shared with Freegle.
Platform auto-email: Stripe receipt (if Dashboard enabled) / PayPal always sends receipt
Payment notification received and stored automatically
1. Logged-in donor matched directly → 2. Email address lookup
Linked: email to user's preferred address
Unlinked: email to Payer address from payment
Email to info@ilovefreegle.org — monitored by Jacky
Automatic email asking donor to declare Gift Aid status
Matches unlinked donations to users by email address
Excluded: PPGF payer account (claims GA itself)
External donations recorded to system via ModTools
Sent automatically after CSV import records donation
Sent to users who received items (last 24h window) — min 7 days between asks
Gold supporter badge on profile/chats for 360 days. Ad-free for 31 days (41 for bank transfers).
Also earned by moderating or microvolunteering.
Web page shown after donation or via email
Gift Aid data for HMRC submission
These are accepted limitations, not bugs — no donor contact details available
Some donors donate without logging in or share
no email. No contact details, no thank-you possible.
GAYL sends confirmation to donor but does not
share user details with Freegle. Cannot thank.
No integration. Possible donations arrive via
Edward runs PPGF import manually and very intermittently.
Donations may go unrecorded for extended periods and may not be fully accounted for.
Unmatched donations — manual support tool searches
Jane and Jacky search using support tools to identify donors.
Currently requires volunteer to manually email. Could be
automated to send personalised thank-yous for smaller donations.
Freegle Donor Process — Generated from codebase review Feb 2026 — Replaces "Freegle donor process Nov 23 v3"
